title: Charming 12 unit property, every unit on a corner, huge one bedroom!
posting_body: Walking distance from City Park, the largest park in Denver, 1444 Saint Paul has found its nook.
With walking access to Sprouts and Bluebird Theatre, the car can be left behind for daily errands as well as evenings out on the town.
Saint Paul’s interiors are here to impress!
With a gas range and quartz countertops, cooking is a breeze.
Card Operated Laundry • Controlled Access • Laundry Facilities • Off-Street Parking • Online Payments Available • Branch Home Office Furniture Discount • Smoke-Free Community •
In Guarantee Apartment Amenities Air Conditioner • All Corner Units • Ample Closet Space •
Dishwasher • Gas Ranges • Hardwood Vinyl Flooring •
Newly Renovated • Refrigerator • Slate Countertops • Stainless Steel Appliances • USB Charging Ports
Mon - Fri: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM  Saturday 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM
